name: Firefox 7+ addons manager small customizations
additional_info:
History:

03.27.12 - Make add-on row slimmer, very discrete change, from 5px padding to 2px; Added option to user remove add-on ID from style, and more small fixes.
12.19.11 - Hiding "more" link (addon details) from not selected addon in list; New screenshot.
12.18.11 - Changed style of link "more" (addon details) to a small arrow image. Credits goes to bug 625465 https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=625465 ; New Screenshot.
10.13.11 - Now you can select title and description (not version or anything else) in addon details to easily copy by shortcut (ie ctrl+c), it's also supports drag and drop extensions like Easy DragToGo+.
10.11.11 - Added background hover effect for addons list entries; Removed warning bar on top of addon details page; Fixed conts content area for some Firefox usrs setup; Removed counts blank space from search category; And more small fixes.
10.10.11 - Removed yellow zebra background from incompatible addons; Removed background color for disabled addons and introduced a default background color for selected one; Better style for addon pending install update.
07.07.11 - Hide warnings from search category, ie not compatible addon.
07.03.11 - Fixed addons counts.

*Add-on ID is useful to detect the physical file of each extension in user profile folder.

style_setting_options.label: Yes (default)
